meaningMnemonic: The kanji refers to a <kanji>bundle</kanji>, but this refers to a <vocabulary>counter for bundles</vocabulary>. Put this on a number, and you have "1 bundle" or "2 bundles" or even three, oh my!
readingMnemonic: Saying "1 bundle" and "2 bundle" takes too long, so you decide to call these bundles what they look like: わ for <reading>wa</reading>lrus (わ)!
